record.bridgyOriginalText:
The speech that Sarah Hurwitz (former Obama speechwriter) gave at the Jewish Federations of North America assembly is a pure Zionist meltdown.

https://youtube.com/watch?v=g1RpYGJsp-A

It brought more evidence to our stance (that Zionism in its modern form is a totalitarian ideology grounded in hate that works by distorting reality, vocabularies and public opinion) than any of our analyses.

The first piece of the totalitarian meltdown is about “It’s worrying that we can no longer control the mainstream narrative, and that mainstream American news no longer has an egemony“:

It used to be that the news you got in America was American media, and it was pretty mainstream; you know it generally didn’t express extreme anti-Israel views. You had to go to a pretty weird bookstore to find global media and fringe media. But today we have social media, which is the global medium; its algorithms are shaped by billions of people worldwide who don’t really love Jews.

It proceeds with a weird comparison between a respected media outlet and a Nazi podcaster:

So while in the 1990s a young person probably wasn’t going to find Al Jazeera or someone like Nick Fuentes, today those media outlets find them; they find them on their phones

Then she proceeds with blaming social media for showing youngsters images of a genocide that they were never supposed to see:

You have TikTok smashing our young people’s brains all day long with video of carnage in Gaza. And this is why so many of us cannot have a sane conversation with younger Jews, because anything that we try to say to them, they are hearing it through this wall of carnage. So I want to give data and information and facts and arguments, and they are just seeing in their minds: carnage. And I sound obscene.

Ms. Hurwitz is justifying a fucking genocide by distorting the narrative around it and blaming those who share the evidence. OF COURSE she sounds obscene. She IS an obscene human being. Telling someone that there’s an logical justification for a carnage isn’t a “sane conversation”: it’s apology of genocide. It’s supposed to be a felony, and she belongs to a jail, not to a stage.

Note: the subject of her concern here is YOUNGER JEWS.

Her problem isn’t with antisemitism. It’s even with YOUNG JEWS who dare to take a look at images of people murdered by Israel.

This is nothing about fighting ethnic hatred, and it’s all about controlling genocidal narratives.

Finally, she completely drops her mask and shows the disgusting Nazi underneath - a Nazi that isn’t even ashamed of distorting the meaning of the memory of the Holocaust:

Holocaust education is absolutely essential, but I think it may be confusing some of our young people about antisemitism. Because they learn about big, strong Nazis hurting weak, emaciated Jews, and they think oh, antisemitism is like anti-black racism, right? Powerful white people against powerless black people. So, when on TikTok all day long, they see powerful Israelis hurting weak, skinny Palestinians, it’s not surprising that they think, Oh, I know the lesson of the Holocaust is you fight Israel. You fight the big powerful people hurting the weak people.

The main purpose of the memory of Holocaust is to recognize the atrocities that happened in that historical moment and acknowledge that they’re not supposed to happen again. Not to Jews, not to Arabs, not to anyone.

Never again means never again for everyone.

Today’s kids mostly got this message right.

But Sarah says that that’s not the purpose of Holocaust remembrance.

The purpose of Holocaust remembrance is to narrowly draw sympathy towards the most uncompromising political Zionist propaganda.

When Zionists just “do it again”, kids aren’t supposed to draw comparisons. Because it’s illegal according to her definition of antisemitism to draw comparisons to Nazis even if you talk like a Nazi and act like a Nazi.

The anti-genocide antibodies injected into kids are supposed to work only when it comes to Jews.

Even the other minorities who were murdered in the Holocaust go increasingly unnoticed, with the message focused only on the Zionist narrative.

This message also resonated last year when the LA Holocaust Museum was forced to backtrack on the “Never again means never again for everyone” message.

Those who exploit the memory of the dead to justify today’s genocide aren’t worth of being custodians of that memory.

They are made of the same clay as those who murdered their grandparents.

And they must be called accountable, removed from their positions, and replaced by those who don’t bend the tragedies of the past to the political interests of the present.

Hi everyone. Chris, Jairaj, and I wanted to let you know that we've heard and have been listening to all the views being expressed about how Substack should think about the presence of fringe voices on the platform (and particularly, in this case, Nazi views).
liust want to make it clear that we don't like Nazis either-we wish no-one held those views. But some people do hold those and other extreme views.
Given that, we don't think that censorship (including through demonetizing publications) makes the problem go away- in fact, it makes it worse.

On Thanksgiving, the immigrant children held at the Dilley detention center gathered in the gym for what they thought was a holiday feast.

The kids salivated over a spread of turkey, sandwiches, pastries and pies, a family told me.

But the food wasn’t for detainees — it was for the staff.

images.alt:
On Nov. 16, a mental health counselor recorded in Kamilla’s medical records that her mother reported the girl had lost her appetite after being “served food that contained worms.”

A week later, the couple said, children were told to gather in the gym for what they believed would be a Thanksgiving celebration. Excitement spread as families saw tables set with turkey, sandwiches, pastries and pies, they said. The children waited expectantly. But when a parent asked when the celebration would begin, Oksana said, staff told them the holiday meal was for employees, not detainees.

The children, she said, watched despondently as the feast was packed away.

record.text: "A lot of people are misunderstanding the Tazewell order. Let me break it down...That injunction is directed at the Clerk — not at the election. The Supreme Court has now denied the stay and made clear the referendum proceeds." - Fmr. Del. Tim Anderson (R) bluevirginia.us/2026/02/brea...

images.alt:
"A lot of people are misunderstanding the Tazewell order. Let me break it down - yes/no

Yes — the judge declared the proposed constitutional amendment void ab initio.

No - The Court did not stop the April 21 statewide referendum.

What this means:
The Judge did not block ballots.
The Judge did not halt certification.
The Judge did not prevent anyone — including voters in Tazewell County — from voting.

What the order actually does is enjoin the Clerk of the Tazewell Circuit Court regarding the § 30-13 posting requirement.

That injunction is directed at the Clerk — not at the election.

The Supreme Court has now denied the stay and made clear the referendum proceeds.

So the vote still happens statewide on April 21. The legal fight continues in court but answers come after voting." - Fmr. VA Del. Tim Anderson, a conservative Republican

When I was taking computer science, back in the dark ages of MS-DOS, I took loads of handwritten notes. Everyone did. Same in the maths classes. I had one of those big calculators that did trigonometry or whatever but we were still expected to write with our hands.
I know how: in class, handwritten essays only, no computers—yes, even in computer science.

images.alt:
Sonnet 4.5 v
 +
 The joke is a play on words combining
 "Domino's" (the pizza chain) with
 "Doctor Who's Who" (a reference guide to
 the TV show Doctor Who).
 The comedian is saying he's compiled
 information about all the employees at
 his local Domino's pizza place into a book,
 and he's calling it "Domino's Who's Who"
 - which sounds like "Doctor Who's Who."
 It's a pun that works on multiple levels:
 • "Who's Who" traditionally refers to a
 directory of notable people
 • It references the TV show "Doctor
 Who"
 • It's about Domino's pizza employees
 (probably not actually notable people
 worth documenting)
 The humor comes from the absurdity of
 creating an official-sounding reference
 book about randon pizza delivery
 workers. presented as if it's something
 Reply to Claude

じゃあ、Manufacturer Specific Data を使って相互にやりとりすれば良いわけで、実験用に 0xFFFF を使う。
ただし、Copilot によれば iBeacon と MSD を使ったときは iOS 内での挙動が異なる、のようなこと言うのでこれも実測する。

iOS で EN API の 0xFD6F がふさがれていることは再確認できたので、EN API ALT として 0xFF00 を入れて受信できるところまで確認。

ただし、iOS の場合は 16 bit UUID の Service Data は提供されていないので、iOS から発信はできない。受信のみ。

▼詳細はこちら

external.description: ペップ・グアルディオラ監督は、国の問題を海外のせいにするのは間違っていると述べました。 これは、マンチェスター・ユナイテッドのオーナーであるジム・ラトクリフ氏が、英国は移民に「植民地化されている」と発言したことへの反響の中で出たコメントです。 グアルディオラ監督は、ラトクリフ氏の発言を謝罪後にコメントしないとしつつも、移民や外国からの人々を問題の原因と見なす風潮は世界的な問題だと指摘しました。 生まれ故郷に関わらず、誰もがより良い生活と将来を求めていると述べ、肌の色や出身地が差別を生むべきではないと強調しました。 自身のキャリアを例に挙げ、様々な国での経験が人間的な成長に繋がったと語りました。 多くの人々は、自国の問題を逃れるために移動しており、異文化を受け入れることでより良い社会が築かれるとグアルディオラ監督は考えます。 マンチェスター・シティのロッカールームが、多様な文化の融合によって恩恵を受けていることを例に挙げ、問題は指導者によって作り出されると述べました。 また、FAカップについて、下部リーグのチームとの対戦は特別な思い出になると語りました。 一方、ロドリ選手は、トッテナム戦での判定について審判の公平性を疑問視したことで、FAから不正行為の容疑で訴えられています。 ロドリ選手は、2月18日までに回答する必要があります。

record.text:
【衝撃】チェルシー、ネトのハットトリックでハル・シティ撃破！FAカップ快勝！ - AIサッカーまとめ

▼詳細はこちら

external.description: チェルシーはFAカップでハル・シティを相手に、プレミアリーグ昇格を目指す相手との難しい試合が予想されたが、見事なパフォーマンスで勝利し、次ラウンドに進出した。 前半にはエステヴァン・ウィリアンとリアム・デラップがチャンスを逃す場面もあったが、ペドロ・ネトがロングシュートで先制点を挙げ、チームを勢いづけた。 ネトはこの後さらに2点を追加し、ハットトリックを達成。 デラップも3アシストを記録し、チームの勝利に大きく貢献した。 チェルシーは過去10年間、この大会でハル・シティと3度対戦し、いずれも決勝に進出しているという良いジンクスがある。 ハル・シティも粘り強いプレーを見せたが、チェルシーの攻撃陣が圧倒した。 ハル・シティの監督は、プレミアリーグ昇格に集中するため、この試合では主要選手を温存したことを明かした。 チェルシーにとっては、新監督にとってさらに自信を深める勝利となった。

record.text:
【衝撃】FC町田ゼルビア、PK戦制し勝ち点5！GK谷2セーブの活躍！ - AIサッカーまとめ

▼詳細はこちら

external.description: FC町田ゼルビアはホームで水戸ホーリーホックと対戦し、2対2の引き分けの後、PK戦を4対2で制しました。 前半39分、相馬勇紀のクロスからエリキが先制点を挙げました。 しかし、後半42分に仙波大志に同点ゴールを許し、44分には鳥海芳樹に勝ち越しゴールを決められました。 町田は前半アディショナルタイム48分に、ナ・サンホのCKから昌子源がヘディングで同点に追いつきました。 後半は両チームともゴールを奪えず、勝負はPK戦へ。 町田のGK谷晃生が相手キックを2本セーブし、チームを勝利に導きました。 町田は開幕戦に続く90分での勝利は逃したものの、勝ち点を5に伸ばしました。 黒田監督はPK戦での成果と谷選手の活躍を称賛する一方、2失点とも中央での対応の甘さがあったと反省を口にしました。

📆 Starttermin 》8. April 2026

🎬 Studio 》TMS Entertainment/Studio 6

youtu.be/pdWQUnshA4M

#GalsCantBeKindToOtaku #オタクに優しいギャルはいない #アニメ #Anime #AnimeNews

images.alt:
🎶 OP 》„HIDE AND SEEK“ von i-dle
🎵 ED 》„Issho Nakako“ von Sanshi Shojo

🎙️ Charaktere & Cast (Japanisch)
»Genichiro Ijichi« von Jun Kasama
»Sayu Amamiya« von Konomi Kohara
»Sho Ijichi« von Atsumi Tanezaki
»Hibiki Ijichi« von Emiri Kato

Mit einem neuen Trailer und einem Visual wurde der genaue Starttermin für »Gals Can’t Be Kind to Otaku!?« offiziell bekannt gegeben. Der Anime startet am 8. April im japanischen TV. Im Trailer ist erstmals der Opening-Song »HIDE AND SEEK« zu hören, der von der Band i-dle gesungen wird. Der Ending-Song »Issho Nakako« wird von der Girlsband Sanshi Shojo beigesteuert. Zudem wurden weitere Mitglieder des japanischen Sprechercasts offiziell vorgestellt.

📜 Beschreibung 》
Takuya Seo ist ein Otaku, der in der Klasse hinter den beliebten Gyaru Ijichi und Amane sitzt. Eigentlich leben sie in völlig unterschiedlichen Welten, doch ein geliehener Radiergummi führt zu einem Missverständnis über Takuyas Lieblingsanime. Als Amane ihn sofort korrigiert, merkt Takuya, dass sie sich verdächtig gut auskennt.

📢【The Final-Boss Prince is Somehow Obsessed with the Chubby Villainess: Reincarnated Me】bekommt eine Anime-Adaption! ✨️

📅 Geplanter Start 》TBA
✨ Genre 》Fantasy, Romance
🎬 Studio 》Studio Lings
▶ Teaser 》
youtu.be/uzM2Fz4jyow?...

#OdebuAkujo #TheFinalBossPrince #おデブ悪女 #アニメ #Anime #AnimeNews

images.alt:
🎙️ Charaktere & Cast (Japanisch)
»Celine« von Haruka Shiraishi
»Wilfred« von Takeo Otsuka

Mit einem Visual und Teaser Trailer wurde heute bekannt geben, dass der Romance Manga »Odebu Akujo ni Tensei Shitara, Naze ka Last Boss Ouji-sama ni Shuuchaku Sareteimasu« von Kotoko (Story) und Kaname Hanamiya (Art) eine Anime-Adaption erhält. Zudem gab man die Mitwirkenden an der Produktion sowie den Sprechercast offiziell bekannt. Weitere Informationen zum Starttermin sind bislang nicht bekannt.

»Odebu Akujo ni Tensei Shitara, Naze ka Last Boss Ouji-sama ni Shuuchaku Sareteimasu« läuft seit April 2023 und wird durch Kadokawa veröffentlicht, bislang umfasst die Reihe 5 Bände.

»The Final-Boss Prince is Somehow Obsessed with the Chubby Villainess: Reincarnated Me« entsteht unter der Regie von Naoyuki Kuzuya (Possibly the Greatest Alchemist of All Time, This Monster Wants to Eat Me). Die Series Composition und das Skript übernimmt Mitsutaka Hirota (Rent a Girlfriend, Edens Zero). Für das Character Design sind Fumino Kakihata und Yukiko Sekita verantwortlich (Sorairo Utility). Produziert wird die Animation bei Studio LINGS (I’m in Love with the Villainess).

📜 Beschreibung 》
Nach einem Tod durch Krankheit wacht sie als Celine wieder auf – der berüchtigten Villainess-Herzogin und Schwester der Heldin aus einem beliebten Roman. Das Problem: In der Originalhandlung wartet auf Celine ein katastrophales Ende, inklusive Tod durch den Heldprinzen. Celine beschließt deshalb, alles zu ändern: weniger Drama, mehr Anstand, und vor allem ein ruhiges, friedliches Leben. Doch je mehr sie sich bemüht, desto weniger läuft nach Plan. Statt dass alle sie meiden, bekommt sie auf einmal Aufmerksamkeit, Wohlwollen und Zuneigung, mit denen sie überhaupt nicht gerechnet hat. Und mit jeder Szene, die sie „retten“ will, entstehen neue Missverständnisse und noch mehr Chaos. Celine will einfach nur Frieden – aber ihr neues Leben scheint andere Pläne zu haben.
Gedenkillustration von Hanamiya
